Body: They should hire better marketing team. Seeing the price in every month almost kills me. Great that they are in the final stage of their project. But couldn't they give ICO investors some hope in the market by creating a better marketing strategy. Market is bad, but with a better marketing strategy, top exchanges would see Wetoken rise. I get it that the first concern is the product but don't forget most of the investors invested in this project at a time when 1 Ethereum was worth around $700 and most of them are in it for the We Tokens. Good working product is all we want. But seriously a better marketing strategy would really help the token price which is $0.000754 as of writing this. Hotspot owners can share free Wi-Fi and earn WeToken but for a measly $0.0007 per WT, do you really think more people will be interested to the World Wifi product?

Thus, technical support will be able to respond quickly to your requests.  Here is the quick guide:  Name of your problem  1.Which actions were taken? 2. What was the result? 3. What the result was expected? 4. Technical specifications (model, OS version, the text of the errors, screenshots of error, url of page) 5. Criticality of the problem (from 1 to 5). Please be adequate. All problems can not be 4 and 5 #problem  Here's official post: https://medium.com/@worldwifi.io/firmware-first-aid-453c5096b0b0

Author: lonesomestranger
Title: [ANN][PreICO]📶World Wi-Fi 🌎 – Global decentralized free Wi-Fi network🚀⚡️🔥
Body: CPA and CPM. What’s that all about?  CPA and CPM are two of the most popular advertising models that people use. You have to realise which one fits your needs better, and that’s why we decided to compare the two and show you how the pricing works in both cases.  What is CPA? CPA (Cost per action), aka cost per acquisition, aka pay per acquisition, aka cost per conversion — it has many names, but they all mean the same thing. It is an online advertising model where advertisers pay for certain actions set beforehand: sale, click, or form submit.  What is CPM? CPM, Cost per Thousand (with M representing Roman numeral for 1000), is a model where the advertisers pays for every 1000 impressions.  Read full article on Medium: https://medium.com/@WorldWifi_ICO/cpa-and-cpm-whats-that-all-about-d4b66f7d4820

Author: lonesomestranger
Title: [ANN][PreICO]📶World Wi-Fi 🌎 – Global decentralized free Wi-Fi network🚀⚡️🔥
Body: Wi-Fi is in the air  Planes are fun, and so are airshows. In fact, they are so fun that spectators can’t help but want to share their emotions on the Internet, journalists do so because it’s their job. That said, airfields are generally located in pretty remote areas where the signal is strong as a dying man’s handshake. Also, covering such areas can be a pain: you cannot put any additional base stations because the sky must be unobstructed. Here’s how we approached this.  Read full story on Medium: https://medium.com/@WorldWifi_ICO/wi-fi-is-in-the-air-444618f38d66

Title: [ANN][PreICO]📶World Wi-Fi 🌎 – Global decentralized free Wi-Fi network🚀⚡️🔥
Body: World Wi-Fi: Keeping Citizens Safe With Wi-Fi And Blockchain  In case you haven't heard, Mexican authorities have found a new way of applying our technologies: emergency population warning. World Wi-Fi as an early warning system. How can national authorities alert citizens of emergencies using blockchain and Wi-Fi technologies?  People have always had the need to notify others about impending danger: Those who knew had a higher chance to see another day, and those who didn’t, were extremely vulnerable. As our society got more advanced, emergency notification systems became more and more sophisticated, but the number of potential threats such as nuclear or chemical plant explosions, radiation leaks, dam bursts or terrorist acts have also grown rapidly.  Read full article on Medium: https://medium.com/@WorldWifi_ICO/world-wi-fi-keeping-citizens-safe-with-wi-fi-and-blockchain-3fb7ced5cede

Author: prehisto
Title: [ANN][PreICO]📶World Wi-Fi 🌎 – Global decentralized free Wi-Fi network🚀⚡️🔥
Body: It seems that noone here has pointed out what is happening with this project and management right now. I have to say that usually I try to concentrate to the good things and keep in mind that everyone are just humans but at this point I feel that as part of crypto community I need say something.  World Wifi raised 25million USD which is a big amount and it makes them a a multi-million company. They used  several names of big exchanges in their campaign and did officially say that they will be be on HitBTC  https://twitter.com/worldwifi_ico/status/996422642990223360  It turns out that they will not be listing in HitBtc  Until now there was not an official exchange for the project ( ICO ended about a month ago) , yesterday they announced the big new exchange as IDAX, which is in 30. place today. Logically investors are not happy and most of them are outraged .  The problem is not the listing in IDAX but the misleading of people with partners like HITBTC in their ICO phase and deleting investors from their telegram group after they become frustrated.  I see similarities with CENTRA and TBAR which got in big trouble with SEC exactly because of MISLEADING INVESTORS IN TO BELIEVING THAT THEY will have certain partners when they did not.  I hope that the team will get it together and start taking responsibility of their actions and comprehend that they raised 25 million dollars.

However, what if you can mine with your router? The mining equipment for the first cryptocurrency Bitcoin has evolved significantly in just a few years and passed a number of milestone stages. Today, only industrial mining of Bitcoin is profitable with a hardware designed specifically for this purpose: ASIC (Application-Specific Integrated Circuit). Author: S3cco
Title: [ANN][PreICO]📶World Wi-Fi 🌎 – Global decentralized free Wi-Fi network🚀⚡️🔥
Body: Bitcoin Garden: Take your Internet Connection to a New level https://bitcoingarden.org/take-your-internet-connection-to-a-new-level/  World Wi-Fi — the company developing a blockchain platform that would integrate home routers and public hotspots around the world into a free global Wi-Fi network — has developed novel Wi-Fi router antennas and is sending them for free to any place in the world to anyone buying 1 Ether or 0.1 Bitcoin worth of World Wi-Fi’s tokens until May 18, 2018.  Built with the most cutting-edge technologies in the field, these antennas focus the Wi-Fi signal and guarantee the high-quality uniform Wi-Fi coverage of a given area.  The World Wi-Fi antennas are compact and equipped with different mounting structures making them equally suitable for using inside, for instance in offices as well for using outside, for instance for covering with Wi-Fi various surrounding structures and grounds like parking lots, playgrounds, nearby houses, etc....

Author: Vladdirescu87
Title: [ANN][PreICO]📶World Wi-Fi 🌎 – Global decentralized free Wi-Fi network🚀⚡️🔥
Body: Free Wi-Fi Around the Globe - Fantasy or Reality?  Imagine, if you will, a world where free wifi was accessible the world over. From every major city to every far-flung town and lost village, wherever one might go he’d be sure to find the reassuring hum and blink of an active router.  He’d never be far from his emails, his movies, his TV shows, and the news he follows even though he knows that he probably shouldn’t. All the while avoiding expensive cell phone networks and getting the fast, reliable service that he’s come to expect at home.  Read the details in the article of Coinidol dot com, the world blockchain news outlet: https://coinidol.com/free-wi-fi-around-the-globe-fantasy-or-reality/

Title: [ANN][PreICO]📶World Wi-Fi 🌎 – Global decentralized free Wi-Fi network🚀⚡️🔥
Body: How useful sharing economy really is? The sharing economy is a new stage in the development of economics; it is not about buying goods but exchanging them. This saves a lot of money for the ‘borrowers’ and makes money for those ready to share goods or render a service. Both sides profit. Sharing can work in almost all areas of life to not only use resources but use them more effectively. The following examples show how successful this has been for different industries. Find out more on WorldWiFi's latest article on Medium https://medium.com/@WorldWifi_ICO/how-useful-sharing-economy-really-is-b73578c9e64d !

His BCT Username is IAMCOUZ & his profile link is:  https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=profile;threads;u=1300690.  Here's the original OTPPAY ANN:  https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=2518622.0 Here's the translated version:  https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=2832694.msg29039749#msg29039749  If you cut & paste the original English version into Google translate you'll see it, word by word.  Apparently this IAMCOUZ has been getting bounties by translating into several other languages such as Chinese and Indonesian.  I bet he's been using Google Translate for them as well.  The reason why he didn't get caught is because he did not post these translations on the local board.  He posted them on the English ANN board, which is against the forum rule as well. Author: Kriptobt1
Title: [ANN][PreICO]📶World Wi-Fi 🌎 – Global decentralized free Wi-Fi network🚀⚡️🔥
Body: Developers Blog 1  Welcome to the first part of our developer’s blog! Here our IT team will post weekly updates about developing the product so everyone can follow our progress. But first, let us remind you what World Wi-Fi is all about.  There are three types of users in the system, according to the project business model. Owners of private routers can distribute free internet and receive rewards for advertising impressions by connecting to World Wi-Fi. Advertisers get their target audience and thus optimize their advertising costs. Regular users get access to free internet by viewing a short ad.  The system is developed with the help of Big Data technology, which is used to collect and analyze non-personified user activity data. Thanks to this technology, advertisers can show their advertising to those who can actually find it interesting. The use of a blockchain technology makes transactions between process participants fast and cheap, while smart contracts guarantee security for all the parties involved.  In this blog, developers headed by Ilya Yashin (CEO of World Wi-Fi), will talk about how the project is progressing and what has already been done. The work on the World Wi-Fi system has been underway since mid-2017 and now the network is being tested. We will be updating the program code on Github, use this link to familiarize yourself with it.  The entire architecture of the project is written with the object-oriented JavaScript language. The server-side portion is written with Node JS. This is a programming platform based on V8 engine (it translates JavaScript into the machine language code), which transforms a narrow focus specialized JavaScript into the universal programming language.  The visual part is written with the language React JS, which is a library for the interface development created by Facebook.  First part of the code presented on Github is dedicated to authentication and authorization of users of World Wi-Fi system. For user’s maximum convenience, a possibility of registration and login through accounts of social networks Google, Facebook and VK has been provided.  Blockchain-platform World Wi-Fi will unite advertisers, owners of routers and internet users in a single network. Three types of accounts with different functionality will be created to organize the work of the whole system:  1. Advertiser: a user can create advertising campaigns and set their parameters. View statistics, manage employee accounts, pay bills, and change the profile.  2. Advertisement distributor (Wi-Fi router owner): a user has access only to the list of his Wi-Fi points and to all operations for their management. Three interfaces that interact with the system are available as well: Router interface, WiFi-identification interface and personal account.  3. Internet User: Internet users have to login on Hotspot. Only the Wi-Fi identification interface and Internet access are available here.  Next week the program code for the customizer of advertising campaigns will be presented, and beta testing carried out.  https://medium.com/@WorldWifi_ICO/developers-blog-1-9e59dbebc5d3

Author: keepboxm
Title: [ANN][PreICO]📶World Wi-Fi 🌎 – Global decentralized free Wi-Fi network🚀⚡️🔥
Body: Importsnt announcement from the World Wi-Fi team  Now there are too many ICOs that raise funds only for an idea and the crypto community is disappointed in such projects, because not all of them reach the working model. We decided to postpone the dates of the tokensale for 1 month in order to have time to complete the beta testing of the platform before the tokensale end. Thus, we will be able to launch the World Wi-Fi platform immediately after the tokensale end, to ensure sales and, most importantly, the liquidity of the WeTokens on the exchanges. Advertisers will be able to access the World Wi-fi platform and will buy WeTokens to conduct advertising campaigns.  The new dates of tokensale: from 18th April till 18th of May 2018.  For all the participants of the presale who bought WeToken for BTC or ETH, the BTC/WeToken and ETH/WeToken rate will be fixed as follows. If the value of the BTC rate is above $ 9000 and the ETH rate is above $ 700, the rate will be fixed by the actual value at the Bitfinex exchange on the 17th of April. If the BTC or ETH exchange rate (depending on the currency in which WeToken was purchased) is below the above-mentioned values, the BTC/WeToken and ETH/WeToken rates will be fixed based on rate as of 1 BTC = 9000 $ and 1 ETH = 700 $, respectively.

Body: There are three key elements: GUEST USER connects to an open wi-  hotspot. Views a short advertisement and start browsering the internet. ROUTER OWNER provides access to the open wi-  network and earns criptocurrency. ADVERTISER utilizing network of private routers to deliver targeted advertisements and pays directly to the router owner.

Author: elrugrim
Title: [ANN][PreICO]📶World Wi-Fi 🌎 – Global decentralized free Wi-Fi network🚀⚡️🔥
Body: The principal market for World Wi-Fi is the online advertising market for the users of residential broadband Internet access through Wi-Fi. Today, it is a vast niche market with few competitors. Our ongoing projects Adrenta and Radius Wi-Fi focus on Wi-Fi advertising in public places (airports, cafes, restaurants, shopping malls). We intend to include them into the World Wi-Fi platform and develop the market of free Internet in public places worldwide on this platform.

Title: [ANN][PreICO]📶World Wi-Fi 🌎 – Global decentralized free Wi-Fi network🚀⚡️🔥
Body: The owners of Internet access points, advertisers and ordinary users can become participants of the World Wi-Fi project. Even the owner of an ordinary home router can connect to the network — after that, his router will begin to distribute two Wi-Fi networks, one of which will be public. Users will be able to access the Internet for free, as the distribution of Wi-Fi will be paid to the owner of the router advertisers who place ads in the world Wi-Fi.

Author: Dwarf42
Title: [ANN][PreICO]📶World Wi-Fi 🌎 – Global decentralized free Wi-Fi network🚀⚡️🔥
Body: Advertising will be shown to the user just before going to the Internet, so the advertiser can be sure that it is really visible, and live people, not bots. The advertiser will be able to choose the audience based on social and demographic data and the history of previous campaigns. Thus, the ad will be shown only to those users who are really interested in this product.

Author: elrugrim
Title: [ANN][PreICO]📶World Wi-Fi 🌎 – Global decentralized free Wi-Fi network🚀⚡️🔥
Body: This is an interesting question)  The principal market for World Wi-Fi is the online advertising market for the users of residential broadband Internet access through Wi-Fi. Today, it is a vast niche market with few competitors. Our ongoing projects Adrenta and Radius Wi-Fi focus on Wi-Fi advertising in public places (airports, cafes, restaurants, shopping malls). We intend to include them into the World Wi-Fi platform and develop the market of free Internet in public places worldwide on this platform.

Author: CravenEconomics
Title: [ANN][PreICO]📶World Wi-Fi 🌎 – Global decentralized free Wi-Fi network🚀⚡️🔥
Body: Are there any problems? What problems does the user face?

Author: elrugrim
Title: [ANN][PreICO]📶World Wi-Fi 🌎 – Global decentralized free Wi-Fi network🚀⚡️🔥
Body: The ¬rst challenge is the diculty to connect to an open Wi-Fi network in many places in the world. With no mobile Internet, the user often sees private locked Wi-Fi networks which are impossible to connect to. Even in places with fast mobile Internet such as LTE some challenges are common: LTE Internet has limitations on the maximum trac, speed, and it is generally more expensive. For tourists and travelers with medium or lower than medium income it is rather expensive to use LTE Internet while roaming. In fact, these are the  rst group of people to search out for Wi-Fi hot spots.

Author: CravenEconomics
Title: [ANN][PreICO]📶World Wi-Fi 🌎 – Global decentralized free Wi-Fi network🚀⚡️🔥
Body: How can I solve this problem? Is it possible to solve this problem?

Title: [ANN][PreICO]📶World Wi-Fi 🌎 – Global decentralized free Wi-Fi network🚀⚡️🔥

Author: kolinko
Title: [ANN][PreICO]📶World Wi-Fi 🌎 – Global decentralized free Wi-Fi network🚀⚡️🔥
Body: Well, but what is the base of the market? What I mean is the principal market for the World Wi Fi project?

Author: CravenEconomics
Title: [ANN][PreICO]📶World Wi-Fi 🌎 – Global decentralized free Wi-Fi network🚀⚡️🔥
Body: The principal market for World Wi-Fi is the online advertising market for the users of residential broadband Internet access through Wi-Fi. Today, it is a vast niche market with few competitors. Our ongoing projects Adrenta and Radius Wi-Fi focus on Wi-Fi advertising in public places (airports, cafes, restaurants, shopping malls). We intend to include them into the World Wi-Fi platform and develop the market of free Internet in public places worldwide on this platform.

Author: kolinko
Title: [ANN][PreICO]📶World Wi-Fi 🌎 – Global decentralized free Wi-Fi network🚀⚡️🔥
Body: I wonder what are the current issues and challenges faced by ordinary users and advertisers today and how to address them using the World Wi-Fi platform?

Author: CravenEconomics
Title: [ANN][PreICO]📶World Wi-Fi 🌎 – Global decentralized free Wi-Fi network🚀⚡️🔥
Body: There are three of them: The fi¬rst challenge is the difficulty to connect to an open Wi-Fi network in many places in the world; The second challenge is the cost for Internet access; The third challenge is lack of financial resources.

Author: kolinko
Title: [ANN][PreICO]📶World Wi-Fi 🌎 – Global decentralized free Wi-Fi network🚀⚡️🔥
Body: Do you have any solutions for these? I hope you have to be honest, tell me please the solution for the third, for example.

Author: CravenEconomics
Title: [ANN][PreICO]📶World Wi-Fi 🌎 – Global decentralized free Wi-Fi network🚀⚡️🔥
Body: Our solution is based on the fact, that the World Wi-Fi platform provides for an accrual of tokens for ad views. We o¬ffer the opportunity to earn cryptocurrency by sharing Wi-Fi and displaying the ads on a router access point which the router owner already has. You can build your own referral network and feel like you are an actual managing director of a communications provider. The World Wi-Fi project has established simple and easy-to-understand conditions to earn some extra income. The amount of income will depend on the eff¬orts of the participants and Wi-Fi owners and the efficiency of their actions only. You can either earn a small amount every month spending a minimum of eff¬orts or earn much more money by connecting many people with free Wi-Fi Internet.

Author: kolinko
Title: [ANN][PreICO]📶World Wi-Fi 🌎 – Global decentralized free Wi-Fi network🚀⚡️🔥
Body: I have one more question about how does the system operates, what is the key to work properly?

Author: CravenEconomics
Title: [ANN][PreICO]📶World Wi-Fi 🌎 – Global decentralized free Wi-Fi network🚀⚡️🔥
Body: When connected to the system, the router creates and makes available for guests one more network. It is isolated from the in-home network on the software level so those connected to the network will not have access to the computers on the main network of the router owner. The Router Owner may set parameters, which are well suited to a public network (speed, maximum number of connections, number of ads to be viewed, and others). When connecting to the guest network, guest users will see targeted ads, which have a higher chance to appeal to them.

Author: kolinko
Title: [ANN][PreICO]📶World Wi-Fi 🌎 – Global decentralized free Wi-Fi network🚀⚡️🔥
Body: Now it is Ok to understand. I’m very excited about the project and I want to be involved in it, to go to looking forward to the future. But what about the token price?

Author: CravenEconomics
Title: [ANN][PreICO]📶World Wi-Fi 🌎 – Global decentralized free Wi-Fi network🚀⚡️🔥
Body: The token pricing will depend on the World Wi-Fi penetration rate in the advertising market. The higher the penetration of the advertising market is, the higher the token price is. This is due to the fact that the token sale market is growing continuously, and the number of tokens remains fixed. Given the development of the World Wi-Fi project, the advertisers will buy more and more tokens on the market to be able to launch advertising campaigns.

Author: ModusPwnd
Title: [ANN][PreICO]📶World Wi-Fi 🌎 – Global decentralized free Wi-Fi network🚀⚡️🔥
Body: According to the UN Report on Global Broadband Progress dated September 18, 2017, the number of Internet users in the world is 3.58 billion people (the total population of the planet is 7.6 billion). Most users are now in developing countries at around 2.5 billion, while developed countries have 1 billion.

Author: leptoon
Title: [ANN][PreICO]📶World Wi-Fi 🌎 – Global decentralized free Wi-Fi network🚀⚡️🔥

Author: ModusPwnd
Title: [ANN][PreICO]📶World Wi-Fi 🌎 – Global decentralized free Wi-Fi network🚀⚡️🔥
Body: Internet advertising costs continue to increase as well. According to the forecasts by Zenithmedia, the market will increase by 13% and reach the value of $205 billion in 2017. The share of Internet advertising will increase from 34 to 36.9% of the total volume of the advertising market.

Author: leptoon
Title: [ANN][PreICO]📶World Wi-Fi 🌎 – Global decentralized free Wi-Fi network🚀⚡️🔥
Body: Can you be more specific about payment here? What is a fee as an example?

Author: ModusPwnd
Title: [ANN][PreICO]📶World Wi-Fi 🌎 – Global decentralized free Wi-Fi network🚀⚡️🔥
Body: World Wi-Fi charges advertisers a fee of 5% of the cost of the advertising shown in the network of connected routers. The fee applies when generating a budget before allocation of tokens to router owners. Averaged calculation of number of views and advertisement cost for 1 router.

Author: leptoon
Title: [ANN][PreICO]📶World Wi-Fi 🌎 – Global decentralized free Wi-Fi network🚀⚡️🔥

The investor is a Mozart Group, the funds were raised in November 2017 At the moment the developers are testing the trial version of network to connect 100 routers. In early March 2018, the network will be ready for alpha testing. Title: [ANN][PreICO]📶World Wi-Fi 🌎 – Global decentralized free Wi-Fi network🚀⚡️🔥
Body: The network will include other projects of the same entrepreneurs — Radius Wi-Fi and Adrente. Recall that the Radius Wi-Fi project is dedicated to providing public Wi-Fi networks with software to identify users by phone number. In Russia, the owners of public Wi-Fi networks are legally obliged to carry out such identification. Adrente is an automated service for advertising campaigns in public Wi-Fi networks, which works on the principle of "one window". According to the developers, in 2017 the number of Wi-Fi points connected to this project increased by 784%. Project networks cover 80 cities.

Title: [ANN][PreICO]📶World Wi-Fi 🌎 – Global decentralized free Wi-Fi network🚀⚡️🔥
Body: How do you plan to develop? What is the main market for your project?

Author: CravenEconomics
Title: [ANN][PreICO]📶World Wi-Fi 🌎 – Global decentralized free Wi-Fi network🚀⚡️🔥
Body: The principal market for World Wi-Fi is the online advertising market for the users of residential broadband Internet access through Wi-Fi. Today, it is a vast niche market with few competitors. Our ongoing projects Adrenta and Radius Wi-Fi focus on Wi-Fi advertising in public places (airports, cafes, restaurants, shopping malls). We intend to include them into the World Wi-Fi platform and develop the market of free Internet in public places worldwide on this platform.

Author: kolinko
Title: [ANN][PreICO]📶World Wi-Fi 🌎 – Global decentralized free Wi-Fi network🚀⚡️🔥
Body: What problems do internet users face? Have you analyzed these problems? It is very interesting to know about this

Author: CravenEconomics
Title: [ANN][PreICO]📶World Wi-Fi 🌎 – Global decentralized free Wi-Fi network🚀⚡️🔥
Body: •   The fi¬rst challenge is the di culty to connect to an open Wi-Fi network in many places in the world. With no mobile Internet, the user often sees private locked Wi-Fi networks which are impossible to connect to. •   The second challenge is the cost for Internet access. For service providers, the provision of Internet access is a core business and they will want to maximize pro tability. •   The third challenge is lack of  nancial resources. Most people worldwide would like to make some additional money, particularly if it only involves sharing an asset that they already have.

Author: kolinko
Title: [ANN][PreICO]📶World Wi-Fi 🌎 – Global decentralized free Wi-Fi network🚀⚡️🔥
Body: How do you plan to solve these problems? Do you have any ideas?

Author: CravenEconomics
Title: [ANN][PreICO]📶World Wi-Fi 🌎 – Global decentralized free Wi-Fi network🚀⚡️🔥
Body: •   World Wi-Fi will enable the maximum area of residential housing worldwide using home routers, and also stimulate distribution of free Internet access in high tra c areas: cafes, bars, restaurants, playgrounds and sports grounds. •   The World Wi-Fi project will enable free Wi-Fi access worldwide. The Internet access will become free as the guest user will just need to view a small ad (10–15 seconds). •   The World Wi-Fi platform provides for an accrual of tokens for ad views. We o¬er the opportunity to earn cryptocurrency by sharing Wi-Fi and displaying the ads on a router access point which the router owner already has. You can build your own referral network and feel like you are an actual managing director of a communications provider.

Author: InfiniteGrim
Title: [ANN][PreICO]📶World Wi-Fi 🌎 – Global decentralized free Wi-Fi network🚀⚡️🔥

Author: Dwarf42
Title: [ANN][PreICO]📶World Wi-Fi 🌎 – Global decentralized free Wi-Fi network🚀⚡️🔥
Body: The owners of Internet access points, advertisers and ordinary users can become participants of the World Wi-Fi project. Even the owner of an ordinary home router can connect to the network — after that, his router will begin to distribute two Wi-Fi networks, one of which will be public. Users will be able to access the Internet for free, as the distribution of Wi-Fi will be paid to the owner of the router advertisers who place ads in the world Wi-Fi.

Author: InfiniteGrim
Title: [ANN][PreICO]📶World Wi-Fi 🌎 – Global decentralized free Wi-Fi network🚀⚡️🔥

Author: Dwarf42
Title: [ANN][PreICO]📶World Wi-Fi 🌎 – Global decentralized free Wi-Fi network🚀⚡️🔥
Body: Payment for the use of the router will be made in eToken cryptocurrency. The amount of reward depends on the number of ads viewed by users through each specific access point. At the same time, the owner of the point receives contributions not only from his device, but also from all routers that joined the network by his link. Itself World Wi-Fi also receives a Commission with the advertisements. The distribution of remuneration is fixed in the blockchain.

Author: World Wi-Fi
Title: [ANN][PreICO]📶World Wi-Fi 🌎 – Global decentralized free Wi-Fi network🚀⚡️🔥
Body: World Wi-Fi project has already heard about SpaceX Global Internet.  We do think that our projects has both a lot of similarities and differences.  We both have existing businesses.World has Radius Wi-Fi hotspots and Wi-Fi advertising AdRenta while SpaceX has Tesla and dozens of branch-companies what means that both us do business in the same way and no doubt that we have the same mission - building a global free Wi-Fi network.  But will Elon Musk let router owners to earn crypto from just sharing your Wi-Fi from your home router?  World Wi-Fi project is not a rocket science and that is why we can exist in reality while SpaceX will face with  really big problems connected to military zones etc. Despite the fact that Elon projects are revolutionary in some aspects and may change the world they do not do real profit. That makes them unexistable.  World Wi-Fi is a global decentralized free network. The users of the platform are ordinary people,  router owners and advertisers. The users enjoy free internet, router owners are paid by advertisers for the ads viewed by the users; advertisers receive an effective tool for targeting of advertising and analytics of advertising campaign effectiveness.  In the end, we want to say that we do like to work in a competitive environment cause it makes us to work harder on improving our project, our website and content.  No doubt that it makes us better and better.   And all that is for you, dear community!

Author: Fritz93
Title: [ANN][PreICO]📶World Wi-Fi 🌎 – Global decentralized free Wi-Fi network🚀⚡️🔥
Body: The World Wi-Fi project is a global decentralized free Wi-Fi network based on private routers which are typically residential routers. Every router owner may share their excess Wi-Fi capacity, allow guests to connect and share the capacity and in the process earn cryptocurrency for this shared capacity. In the end, everybody wins: while guest users get free Internet access, those who own routers generate income, and advertisers reach their target audience. World Wi-Fi is an global project built by the community.

Author: elrugrim
Title: [ANN][PreICO]📶World Wi-Fi 🌎 – Global decentralized free Wi-Fi network🚀⚡️🔥
Body: •   The first challenge is the difficulty to connect to an open Wi-Fi network in many places in the world. With no mobile Internet, the user often sees private locked Wi-Fi networks which are impossible to connect to. •   The second challenge is the cost for Internet access. For service providers, the provision of Internet access is a core business and they will want to maximize pro tability. •   The third challenge is lack of  nancial resources. Author: keepboxm
Title: [ANN][PreICO]📶World Wi-Fi 🌎 – Global decentralized free Wi-Fi network🚀⚡️🔥
Body: World Wi-Fi project is a global decentralized free Wi-Fi network based on private routers. Every router owner may share free Wi-Fi, connect to other users, and earn cryptocurrency. In the end, everybody wins: while ordinary users might no longer pay for the internet, those who own routers generate profits, and advertisers reach their target audience.  Join World WI-FI Community                             Main details Token: WeToken Total tokens issued: 600 000 000 WT. Total tokens available for sale: 258 000 000 WT    ●   Pre-Sale 10% of total tokens for sale, or 60 000 000 WT;    ●   Token Sale 33% of total tokens for sale, or 198 000 000 WT.    ●   Unsold tokens will be destroyed. Currencies accepted: Ethereum (ETH), Bitcoin (BTC), Fiat  Pre-sale - November 28, 2017 — March 16, 2018 Main Sale - April 18, 2018  — May 18, 2018  BOUNTY THREAD 12 000 000 WT (2%)   Token freeze    -   7% of all tokens are payable to the pool of founders, the tokens shall be frozen for 1 year.    -   5% of all tokens shall be reserved for motivation of the project team members, the tokens shall be paid following the implementation of the project.    -   40% of all tokens shall be frozen for 1 year and further used for the project development. Sale of tokens will allow spreading the project over to new countries and ensure liquidity for the advertisers. A preliminary estimate shows that the sale of tokens will be distributed by years taking into account the restrictions as follows:       ●   in the 2nd year, no more than 10% can be sold (39% of tokens frozen for the future development);       ●   in the 3rd year, no more than 20% can be sold;       ●   in the 4th year – no more than 30%;       ●   in the 5th year, the restrictions on the sale shall be removed.     However, the tokens sale may be distributed for the extended period depending on the project needs.   The Board of Directors composed of founders, CEO and independent directors shall be established. The Board of Directors shall decide when and how many tokens shall be sold. The sale volume and terms will depend on the market situation and objectives of the company.  Market overview     According to UN Report on Global Broadband Progress dated September 18, 2017, the number of Internet users in the world is 3.58 billion people (the total population of the planet is 7.6 billion). Most users are now in developing countries—there are 2.5 billion users there, while developed countries have 1 billion.     Development of Wi-Fi networks  At the same time, there is a rapid spreading of Wi-Fi networks. They have virtually covered the whole world: according to ipass.com, at the beginning of 2017 the number of Wi-Fi points across the world amounted to 177,418,979.   Now, there are 262,262,359 Wi-Fi access points across the globe: · 82% are household Wi-Fi points. · 18% are public controlled Wi-Fi points.  From the beginning of the year, compared to 2016 indices, the number of points has increased by 48%. Over the last four years, the number of points increased nine-fold.  Advertisers  The demand for Wi-Fi advertising is growing: due to high accuracy and strong possibility that a real user will see it. But Wi-Fi advertising market was occupied by local monopolists based on geographical position. Restaurant and shopping mall networks broadcast advertisements in case of connection to open Wi-Fi in their premises, different operators have different targeting and conversion methods. At present there is no unified Wi-Fi advertising market, and pricing is often chaotic.    New advertising network  Modern advertising networks, e.g. AdSense, charge high fees. Advertising salesmen have to share 30-50% of profits with the platform, while most of it is spent on compensation of financial and bureaucratic costs of an advertising network.  In current conditions only several companies and popular bloggers whose platforms have large amount of traffic may count on significant advertising profit.  World Wi-Fi provides access to wide audience to the advertisers by means of connection to small private routers and sites. Internet access points owners are able to earn money by means of broadcast of advertisements. This is the way the promising advertising market inside the global Wi-Fi network is formed.  World Wi-Fi Business Model  The World Wi-Fi charges advertisers a fee of 5% of the cost of the advertising shown in the network of connected routers. The above fee applies when generating a budget before allocation of tokens to router owners.  Road map   Join World WI-FI Community
